DOC.brief_title: Continuous Versus Short Infusions Ceftazidime Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: Each patient receive two successive IV antibiotic course period pulmonary exacerbation . One course deliver thrice daily 30-minute infusion ceftazidime 100 ml 0.9 % sodium chloride , deliver continuous infusion ceftazidime 230 ml 0.9 % sodium chloride , 23 hour . The daily dose ceftazidime 200 mg/kg , maximum dose 12 g. For ceftazidime continuous infusion , load dose 60 mg/kg ( maximum 2 g ) use . All patient also receive tobramycin ( 10 mg/kg ) , form one 30-minute infusion per day . Portable device use : Intermate® SV 200 ( Baxter ) 30-minute short infusion ceftazidime tobramycin , Infusor® LV10 ( Baxter ) continuous infusion ceftazidime .
